https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/7p1l7egp9RbCgWpL4Y2EpkoE6jE.jpg A beautiful heiress hires a pair of sexy private detectives to provide security for her Hollywood fund-raiser. A busty villain and her assistants crash the event in order to steal the money and kidnap the heiress. After a number of captures and escapes, the four lovely ladies are left securely bound and gagged, while the henchmen make off with the loot. Costume Party Peril
